Text: Possible Partnering Opportunity with EnronDear Mr Skilling Good day to you I believe our companies may have a fit for a possible working relationship My name is Gayle Johnson and I am with Working Solutions wwwworkingsolcom We are a virtual service management company and specialize in contact center management including voice email chat fax and VOIP using homebased agents Our virtual community of educated experienced agents is highly scalable providing solutions for peak demand high spike call volumes and short notice applications We currently have over agents speaking languages who have been tested and their experience levelskill sets have been logged We have a different model that eliminates the benefit load infrastructure costs and bricksmortar issues of a traditional contact center by using our network of agents We also utilize your existing technology infrastructure to keep all reporting and management functions consistent within your organization If youd like to consider outsourcing customer care tech support agents etc I know we have a quality costeffective solution for you At your request I can send you a two page overview of our company I look forward to exploring this possibility with you Sincerely Gayle Johnson Working Solutions ext Working Solutionsenabling the world to work for you
